item.description:
We will continue with the second third of Spinoza's Theological-Political Treatise from chapter 7 through 13(including 13). Due the cancellation of the last meeting this meeting's topic will be the first 2/3 of the text.
(Its the holiday season, so if for some reason Rendang is closed let's meet next door in the Bombay Club.)
item.name: Spinoza: Theological-Political Treatise II
